name: You're Hired! (JustDrum)
description:
You're Hired! is a game designed to help young adults navigate the working world. In this game you are tasked with completing a job interview, receiving a job offer and continue to work your way up the company ladder until ultimately purchasing your own franchise of Burger Express. The game offers a series of tasks and accomplishments that will result in you receiving promotions as you go. In this version simply using the arrow keys will navigate you through the prototype. 

25 Pts- Promoted to Manager 

50 Pts- Promoted to General Manager

100 Pts- Purchase your own franchise!
